general.region: PJSK region to use. Defaults to your default region (EN, or the one you set in settings).
general.discord_user: Discord user you want to view.
general.event_wl_character: Use a chapter-specific character leaderboard (World Link).

errors.invalid_input: Invalid input. Please check your parameters.

describes.filter: The b30 song status filter to use.
describes.count: Amount of songs to display in your best charts, instead of 30. Value between 1-50. âœ¨PREMIUM

calculate.name: calculate
calculate.desc: Calculate score for chosen chart. 39s exclusive!

describes.score: Your score in P/G/G/B/M format (supports greats only and G/G/B/M as well)

comics.name: comics
comics.desc: View in-game comics, as seen in loading screens.

border.name: border
border.desc: Displays the current event border (highlight) rankings.

predict.name: predict
predict.desc: Predict cutoffs for the current event. (sourced from jiiku831)

schedule.name: schedule
schedule.desc: Displays the current and future event schedule.

view.name: view
view.desc: View details of a specific rank.

describes.reverse_odds: Swap the odds for 2* and 4* cards.

progress.name: progress
progress.desc: View your PJSK progress! Shows APs, FCs, and Clears for ALL song levels in a difficulty.

view.name: view
view.desc: View details of a specific player at this rank.
